content: Smooth, error free, professional work.
Great game no issues
Fun
Fast play, good AI competition, great hearts game!

You can pick and choose characters to play against with different skills that you have to learn to read. Really lovely game. My only wish is that it could rotate horizontally for viewing. Cards would be easier to read.

Great game, worth the money. My one complaint is that the AI is programmed to give YOU as many points as possible, particularly with the queen. They will hold that until the last possible moment unless they know you are going to take the trick. That said, it adds a fun (if aggravating) challenge to the game.
No ads
Love hearts

This is a great game and one of the few games I have actually purchased. The developer responds to my questions. I think they should change the default for passing to alternate rather than always pass to the left. I was confused that you had to finish a game to change this setting under Rules.
replyContent: To change passing, please finish your current game, leave table and go to Rule Settings (under PLAY on the Player Selection screen). Here you can choose Card Passing: ALT.

content: Love the app, game play seems fair. Would love to see more stats if possible, and landscape orientation would make seeing the cards easier.

replyContent: Thank you for your thoughts. We believe our ad-free apps are actually low in cost. We work hard to stop inappropriate ads and set all ad network filters to block adult ads. However ad networks send too many ads to check them all. Please report any problem cases to support@aifactory.co.ukvv

replyContent: The paid version has no ads and installs as a separate app. Please open "Hearts", not "Hearts Free". On first start-up it picks up stats from the free version if you have allowed stats recording in both apps.

content: A thinking man's game

Fun,no adds!
Can someone please tell me how to change the difficulty level on this app? When I bought it, it started on level 7 where it remains.
replyContent: To change difficulty level, please finish your current match and go to the Player Selection screen. Here you can tap on "change" beside any player and choose from the list that appears. Difficulty level is the sum of the chosen players' stars so easier opponents mean that the difficulty level is reduced.

content: Pretty good, and tough. Minimum of the annoying "extras" that most hearts games seem to think we want. But some peripheral annoyances. For example I like to see the scores for all the rounds of the game. Only shows the latest.
Very challenging.
Very imbalanced compared to real games.
replyContent: Thank you for your comment. We design our games to be fair and fun and as much like real games as possible. Deals are random, determined by a random number generator based on your device time in milliseconds. Creating human-style play in card games is difficult so AI is still a work-in-progress and will improve.

content: Best heart games out there. I paid for the full version, no more adds, brilliant. I wish all companies would allow you purchase the add free version, I would appreciate that and purchase more games.
Well designed, rules are accurate!
Every time you change phones, it requires you to buy full version. Very frustrating!
replyContent: You do not have to buy again on a new phone. App purchase is linked to account, not device. So once you have purchased an app from the store, it should always be available to download on any device that can support it, so long as you are signed in to the app store with the same Google account used for purchase.

content: Challenging AI, fast paced games, no BS. Exactly what we need in these trying times.

Overall I like this version of the game. You can make it as challenging as you want at the time. It is fast paced and fun to play. Occasionally one of the cards picked to pass gets stuck so you can't "unpick" it. If you go to the menue and back to the game it fixes the issue. Doesn't happen often but slightly annoying.
replyContent: We're sorry you've seen a problem with the app. We've not seen this here or had any other reports, so please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details to help us understand what might be happening. Thank you.

It's a very well designed app, functions very well and a lot of fun to play. In my original review I suggested that the app manipulates hands, i.e. if you're playing against "easy" virtual players you're more likely to get a better hand than if you're playing against "difficult" virtual players. But I accept the developer's response below, it was probably just my bad-loser perception! Great app!
replyContent: Thank you for your thoughts but deals really are random, determined by a random number generator based on your device time in milliseconds, and lower skill cpu players are deliberately weakened so they make more misjudgements during play. Random deals mean that any player can also see lucky streaks at any time.

content: OK, tks for clarifying. Very good version of this game.

content: Good Game works fine despite the odd suspicions of being played so to say. good pastime.

Good game interface. I play it a lot, but it has a couple of issues: it hangs when first accessing the interface (rather often) - I have to go to the Applications menu and kill the program, then it starts OK. Another improvement to the game would be more rule options in settings. For instance: allowing play of the Queen of Spades to break hearts; also when one shoots the moon, there should be an option to subtract points from ones own score instead of adding points to everyone else's score.
replyContent: We're sorry you're seeing a problem with the app. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details. We have added your other suggestions for consideration on our to-do list.

content: A1 factory's games are good fun, would like to buy more but too expensive ! I would like to see a discount for multiple game purchase ! how ever grate work A1 :-) !

This is a really enjoyable Hearts game with lots of customization for skill levels. I have played Hearts for many years in thhe real world and do NOT see the alleged cheating some reviewers complain about. Suggestion: be able to reset player stats. Thanks for fun game!
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. To reset player stats, please go to Menu, Statistics and choose "Reset Stats".

content: Since having upgraded to Android 9 the app freezes after I've selected the three cards to pass on. My version of Hearts is the latest update .
replyContent: Could you please go to Options and uncheck "Tap table to play card" and "Tap table to clear trick" to see if that helps? Alternatively please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details to help understand what might be happening. Thank you.

content: very difficult to win!!!

Here you can tap on "change" beside any player and choose from the list that appears. Difficulty level is the sum of the chosen players' stars so easier opponents mean that the difficulty level is reduced.

content: Been playing hearts for 50 years. This game finds ways to cheat that are blatant. I already wrote to developer. If you want to always lose, this is the game for you.
replyContent: Thank you for your input but none of our games cheat. Our game engines are licensed to other companies and used in serious academic research, so cheating is not an option.

content: Easy to use
Keeps freezing up... about every third time i try to open it.
replyContent: We're sorry you're seeing problems with the app. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details.

content: Simple, great Hearts game. Would be nice to be able to set custom score limits.
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestion. We have added this for consideration on our to-do list.

content: thx for this memorable games.....
I can't tell you how many hours this game has taken from me. Best time killer of all.

Despite the developer's assertions otherwise, there is no way the cards are dealt randomly. But if you accept the fact that you will always get high cards against tough opponents, it's fun to play. And I can predict which player the app has chosen to win a hand quickly, which helps.
replyContent: Thank you for your comment however cards really are dealt randomly and the winner of a hand has not been chosen by the app. Our game engines are licensed to other companies and used in serious academic research, so unfair play is not an option and we simply would have nothing to gain from it.

content: This is still the best version of classic styled Hearts. I'm going through a phase where I've been playing old school PC games so this game is a treat. On a different note, I'd like to see a classic blackjack game created by you guys. One with no in-app purchases, not online, just like old PC like your other games. It's a thought!
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestion. We're a very small team and we're currently kept very busy maintaining our existing apps, so we have no timeline for when we might get to develop any new apps (although we would very much like to!).

content: Remaining tricks should be automatic as soon as possible !!
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestion. We have added this for consideration on our to-do list. However we're a very small, very busy team with lots of apps to look after so can't say how long it might take to assess any work.

content: Great game with realistic play. Should port the "illegal move" message from Spades. In Hearts, picking an incorrect suit pops a prompt message (irritating).
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestion. This is on our list to assess but we are a very small, very busy team so cannot say when we might have a chance to do this.

content:
The AI plays really well in comparison to many hearts games I've played. 
Don't know when the devs will ever add features, but here's 4 that would 
make the game way better: 1. stats for 1st 2nd 3rd 4th place, number of 
times you've shot the moon; 2. Tram button to speed up the end of the hand 
3. An option for a blind 4. More passing options -- dealer chooses, turn 
off hold, etc.
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We have added these for consideration on our to-do list. Unfortunately we're a very small, very busy team with lots of apps to look after so can't give a timeline for any work.

content:

replyContent: Thank you for your suggestion. We have added this for consideration on our to-do list.

content: Toooo many ads More apps &&&&

content: Simple app keeps gameplay smooth. Couple requests: optional rule if you hit 100, go down to 50. replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We have added these for consideration on our to-do list.

content: Very good app. Please keep up the good work.

replyContent: We're sorry you're experiencing problems with the app. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details.

content: This game is well made and visually appealing. The one drawback, and it's a HUGE one, is in the game play. When you play in real life it's everyone for themselves. In this game all 3 opponents play against you. They will slam you with points and give the Jack of Diamonds to the player with the lowest score. This is not realistic and very frustrating. I wish I had not purchased it.
replyContent: Thank you for your review but the computer opponents don't gang up on you. Getting human-like play just right is not as easy as expected but we are looking to improve it. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk to arrange a refund.

content: I enjoy playing the game without Jack of Hearts rule on.   Jack of Hearts rule has off by one error?  If I take the jack of Hearts,  the player to my left gets the - 10 score.  Update:  I figured out what was going on...late night user error.  -10 for Jack of hearts?  I played again when I was awake and all is good.  Plus one star for quick response from developer :)
replyContent: We're sorry you're experiencing problems with the app. We've not seen this issue here or had any similar reports. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details.

content: This is a really good game. The graphics are nice and clear, it's quick and simple to grasp. Well worth 99p

replyContent: Thank you for your suggestion. We have added this for consideration on our to-do list.

content: Solid game, smooth UI, satisfying sound effects, well-differentiated AI opponents, and even win/loss statistics. Everything I might want in a single-player Hearts app.

The game plays completely crappy whoever programmed it either has never played hearts are they just took some generic Hearts program off source  forge and incorporate that into a nice UI I can't tell you the number of times that the low man will have like 10 points the three of us will have a hundred points and the computer drops the Queen of Spades on the human it makes no sense and then I'll replay the two hands in question and then the computer it just to do the wrong thing again horrible programming
replyContent: We apologise for your frustration. Getting human-like play just right is not as easy as expected but we are looking to improve this app, adapting enhancements made to our Spades engine.

content: Loved free version except for the lag. Paid for it, not the jack doesn't register at all!  No way to enable it in menu.
replyContent: To adjust the Jack of Diamonds rule, please finish your current match and go to "Rule Settings" (under "PLAY" on the Player Selection screen).

content: Game is very seldom in my favor. Good thing this isn't for money.   I would like to thank the developer for his/her response albeit a little catty, I appreciate him/her for informing me about my error in judgement. I play the game, I lose, I pout. It is still a pretty good game. I didn't realize I was accusing them of cheating, my bad.
replyContent: Thank you for your review. We're sorry if our reply came across badly! We understand that if someone has a bad streak of luck it can sometimes feel like deals aren't random so we just want to reassure players that they really are random.

replyContent: We’re sorry you're experiencing problems. Please unistall and reinstall, or contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details of the issue.

content: I have been having a lot of fun with your Hearts, my 1st game from your studio. I only play the hardest AI players and they are very strong. Do they team up against the low score player though? I have caught them sticking it to me instead of the low score player near the end game. One suggestion: please allow option to speed up play. Even with fast animation and all screen taps set in options, the game flow is far too slow. I want the AI to play their cards instantly.
replyContent: Thank you for your report. We assure you that the AI players don't gang up on you. Getting human-like play just right is not as easy as expected but we are looking to improve it. We will add your suggestion for consideration on our to-do list.

content: good card game but on fast it goes funny and slows down all was fine till the last update would be good to see this fixed because it can become annoying   P.s seems only to be a problem on tablet works well on phone
replyContent: We’re sorry you're experiencing problems. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details of the issue.

content: Fun time waster, plenty of challenges, and easy learning curve. You can get a raw deal every now and then, but that's life. Also, great price!(less than a deck of real cards!) Update: !! When passing rules are enabled there is a bug so that the A.I. failed to pass back to Me and the game hangs(seems to only happen with lower ranked "female" A.I., forget which one though)! I like the game, so please fix this! Also thank you for your prompt responses!
replyContent: We’re sorry you're experiencing problems. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details of the issue.

content: Better AI than all others in this app store.  Stats are too basic - check your competitors for expanded stats possibilities.  Would be nice to offer more speed options (your one fast option isn't very fast).  Update: did fast get slower after recent update?
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We have added these for consideration on our to-do list. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details of any speed issue.

content: I would have given the last version before the update 4 stars (there were some issues that needed improving for the longest time, e.g. auto play feature when the cards play themselves, programming players that play to survive instead of dumping points on the lead loser, & option to turn off notification that comes up every time an illegal card is touched); it was the best hearts app out there though so I bought the no-ad version a couple years ago. But alas an upgrade was done recently that slowed it.
replyContent: We’re sorry you're experiencing problems. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details of the issue.

content: The first 20 games the AI acts like a real player.  Once it catches on that you play decent, the AI becomes aware of the card layout in ways that it could not possibly know, hand after hand after hand.  Destroys the enjoyment of the game.
replyContent: Thank you for the input. We assure you that the cpu players do not know what cards you have, although they can make deductions as any human player can.

content: Good AI and interface.
Great job

This would be a GREAT app if we could play against real players. I hate the idea of playing against bots (although they sometimes play better than real people) online.    P.S. If you guys (Al Factory) need more money to make your apps better, please just charge more. I would be more than willing to pay $10 per app to play your Hearts, Spades and Chess games against real people.
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback. We are currently exploring the idea of adding online multiplayer to our games but we are a very small, very busy team so it is unlikely we will be able to release anything in the near future.

content: Really liked this the first few months.  But for some reason the same player always gets the queen now at least 75 - 80% of the time and consequently that player reaches 100 first.  Its not just a losing streak.  Its been doing this for close to a month now.  I really liked the graphics so its disappointing.
replyContent: Thank you for your input. We assure you that all deals are strictly random, determined by a random number generator based on your device time in milliseconds. Sometimes players will see unlikely sequences of deals but use of our apps by other companies only happens because they are fair.

content: It worked when I download it but when I went back to play again it was frozen and would not let me play. This is the second hearts game I'v bought. That quit working shortly after I got it. What's up with that
replyContent: We’re sorry you're experiencing problems. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details of the issue.

content: it is really good but the ai needs improving. it seems I am the only one who gets the queen of spades.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We assure you that all deals are strictly random, but this will sometimes create lucky or unlucky streaks for any player.

content: Looking forward to Wi-Fi/Bluetooth mode to come so I can play with my friends.
replyContent: We are exploring the idea of adding online multiplayer to our games but I‘m afraid we’re a very small company with a very long to-do list so it may take some time.

content: Low rating because it jams every 2-3 days and I have to go thru the disinstall/install process each time.
replyContent: We’re sorry you're experiencing problems. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details of the issue.

content: This game now seems to match the free version in options. I was initially more pleased with this app but further play testing shows that at the beginning of a game that the players will pass dropping the queen on other players and hold it for me. Still fun though still play it a lot.
replyContent: Thank you for your review. We assure you that the computer players don't target you. Getting human-like play just right is not as easy as expected but we are looking to improve it.

content: Game is designed to deal out wins and losses. Determined to achieve a percentage of wins or loses. No random deals.
replyContent: Thank you for the input. We assure you that all deals are strictly random. Use of our apps in academic research and by other companies would not happen if they were rigged.

content: The App works well, definitely a favourite.  However game play is a little clunky..  ie jittery, and it's would be so much better with the ability to rotate the screen. Small things,  but would definitely improve it.
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestion. Landscape is on our list to do but I'm afraid we are prioritizing other top requests first within our range of games. We have around 350 reviews a day so there are many requests and we are a very small team.

content: Not enough space here to list all the cheats I saw.  Final straw: caught it leading Hearts before they were broken! Yes, it's proving difficult to play fair.  It's worth 99 cents.
replyContent: We assure you that our games do not cheat. Sometimes the AI will have lucky streaks and sometimes you will. Our game engines are licenced to other companies and used in serious academic research, none of whom would put up with cheating. Please send screenshots of issues to support@aifactory.co.uk.

content: Why is it dealing me the 2 of clubs more often than the odds would suggest?
replyContent: We assure you that all deals are random. Over millions of games sometimes players will see unlikely sequences of cards. Our game engines are used by other companies and in serious academic research, which would not happen if they cheated.

content: It's difficult to find apps of classic games on the market because they're typically trash cash grabs. The free version of this game was top notch, which earned my purchase. I hope the rest are as good as this. Look to see reviews on them soon.
Card
At least make this configurable. Oh and why didnt you reply to my email?
replyContent: Thank you for your input. We will add this as a candidate idea for consideration on our to-do list. Our apologies that your email slipped through the net.

content: Great game for everyone!!!
One of the better hearts games I have played
Custom background doesn't work

content: The AI players make some really dumb plays at times; like a beginner would do.  It would be nice if you could call the hand once all the hearts are out or if you know that you will take the remaining tricks.
Great version of Hearts. Every game by this team is absolutely top-notch.

Even the higher rated "opponents" make incredibly stupid moves. Half the time they don't seem to understand the significance of the queen (or jack diamonds). Besides the lousy AI, no complaints whatsoever.
Simple and done well.
Fun to play
Not too bad!  Of course its going to have some bugs.  If it did not, well, we would not be able to complain!
with old MS Games. Works great, backgrounds can be changed and there are many difficulty options. Well worth the dollar for all the replay value. You guys are probably my favourite developers!
Liked this game a lot until it froze on "game over".  Now what?
replyContent: We’re sorry you're experiencing problems. Please contact support@aifactory.co.uk so we can get some more details of the issue.

content: Stunned there is no option for 'hitting on the first trick'.  Hearts games issued years ago had this simple feature.  Also, the AI is inconsistent at the 5 star ratings.
replyContent: We are looking to improve this app, improving the AI and adding options.

content: It cheats,  not fun when the game cheats,  don't waste your money  or time.
replyContent: Hearts doesn't cheat and we have not seen any problems here. Please send screenshots to support@aifactory.co.uk so we can assess the cards if you believe there is a problem.

content: The Good - Attractive graphics, decent AI, nice set of options, very stable. Nice AI options for people learning to play. The Bad - Portrait only, undo can be abused by cheaters, invalid card notification could be less annoying The Ugly - Although decent, the highest AI can sometimes make very stupid moves and is not aggressive enough in preventing players from shooting the moon.  Overall, worth every penny as a quick diversion and will satisfy all but the most demanding players.

The AI in this app is so easy to beat that playing seriously becomes monotonous. Instead, the only option becomes trying to shoot the moon every hand, which is considerably easy to achieve given the convenience of the undo button.
replyContent: Thank you for your input. We are looking to improve this app. Getting human-like play just right is not as easy as expected.

content: Beautiful graphics too.
Thanks
Good app. Fun game, just wish it had landscape option. It would make it more comfortable to play. And I agree with previous post, an UNO game by AI would be a good game and worth paying for.

Hearts was the game of choice in the break times in my old job. That's before the days of Android lol. This is a brilliant interpretation of it and I support all this dev's apps. They are the best dev for supporting even the most basic phone and live up to their name. Keep supporting them. Btw I would love to see a version of UNO by them which I consider to be the most addictive game of all time. Keep up the good work :-)
Multiple level opponents, good randomization.
This game gets me through some boring times
Excellent!
An elegantly designed game in every way, with increasing customization options in the upgrades. Great fun.
Once again, another great game from AIfactory. Hard to win though it is.
Why should I keep paying whr n it keeps locking up? Fun game but I will stick to free!
I just rated the free version, saying I'd happily pay for this game, and then found the ad-free version here, so had to buy it! Love this game!
Good game
Great interface. AI is transparent but what can you do.

Play and AI are great and the ability to choose the difficulty allows for challenge and growth as a player. Also appreciate the small amount of requested permissions.  Wish I could play online with friends but still well worth 5 stars and a dollar to the dev.
Really like ability to chose level of difficulty
Best heart game. Incredible AI. Lives up to the devs name.
Tried playing 4 times and in the middle of each one, the game would freeze and the Tab would reboot.  Annoying!
Thanks a lot Great job, this is the best Hearts game I've ever installed.  Continue the good job guys

Had this installed the free version sometime ago on another device and liked it. Have a different device now for several months hadn't had it and stumbled upon it and WOW, how much has changed for the better! Great job AI Factory! Love it! Worth the small fee!
Well written. Many levels of difficulty.
Card order (eg no clubs on left) makes this a bad purchase. Too bad as it is fun, just very frustrating UI.

Another solid card came from AI Factory. These guys are now my go to for apps. Excellent graphics and I love that I can choose what deck of cards, if my oponents picture is displayed and the background colour. Lots of different level AIs that I have yet to try out.   Very fast, doesn't suck up my battery and I hasn't needed a force close. Only after playing the game for maybe an hour nonstop does it slow down for a few seconds, but it goes back to it's normal speed.   Highly recommended and well worth the money.
Great graphics. Had this game for a while. Still can't stop playing it.
Great!
Plays only occasionally on my tablet very disappointed

The graphics are nice. The AI is decent, and I like having a choice of levels of AI strength.  I've tried several of the hearts on the market, and this one was the best; I kept playing the free version so I decided to finally upgrade to the paid version.  If only I could play against another person using another phone, it would be perfect.

I'm enjoying Hearts. Same basic interface as their Spades game, but a bit more mindless since I don't have to figure out how many tricks to bid. ;)  The thing I *really* like about the for-pay versions of their games is that they get rid of all of the networking permissions, which means that it's a much safer investment. I don't have to worry if the company is selling my private information as has been found in other apps.
